channel.title: Bootstrap 4 on Bastien
channel.description: Recent content in Bootstrap 4 on Bastien

item.title: Fondation la dépêche
item.description: Sorry, you don't have HTML5 video and we didn't catch this properly in javascript. You can try to view the gif directly: https://thumbs.gfycat.com/LinearUniqueAlligator-size_restricted.gif. The biggest challenge was to adapt to the customer comebacks, doubts and many changes, including during the development phase, in very short deadlines. The "Occitanie Jobs" section was the most complex to redesign. At first, the UX was not adapted to a smooth and clear navigation.

item.title: SKLTN
item.description: I was searching for a solution to avoid some dumb repetitions at the beginning of a website project. Whether I create without a base or retrieve code I had already done before, I was always wasting time. I wanted to have a simple and flexible project base with only the components that I need. I came up with the idea to merge the great possibilities of the css pre-processor SASS and the power of Yeoman to give a helping hand to the start up of projects.
